name: Telegram Quick Response Bot
description: 24/7 instant response bot for candidate communication via Telegram. Provides real-time shift matching, application submission, document uploads, interview scheduling, and recruiter connections. Features interactive inline keyboards, command routing, and Slack team notifications. Perfect for mobile-first gig workers who need instant responses.
useCase: Automates instant communication with candidates via Telegram bot for shift matching, applications, and scheduling

workflow.trigger: Telegram Bot receives message or callback query
steps: Extract user data (ID, username, first name, message text, chat ID)
Log all messages to Google Sheets (Telegram_Messages)
Send context-appropriate response with inline keyboard buttons
Notify recruiting team on Slack for follow-up
Handle callback queries from inline keyboard interactions

commands./start: Welcome message with main menu and interactive buttons
commands./shifts: View available shifts near user's location
commands./apply: Quick application with guided or bulk data entry
commands./documents: Upload compliance documents via Telegram, web, or email
commands./contact: Connect with recruiter via phone, email, or Telegram
commands./help: Show all commands and natural language examples

features.instantResponse: 24/7 automated responses to all messages (sub-second latency)
features.commandRouting: Intelligent routing based on slash commands and keywords
features.interactiveButtons: Inline keyboards for one-tap actions (no typing required)
features.naturalLanguage: Understands plain English queries (e.g., 'Show me ICU shifts in LA')
features.messageLogging: All conversations logged to Google Sheets for compliance
features.slackNotifications: Team alerts for urgent requests or recruiter connections
features.multiChannelUpload: Documents accepted via Telegram photos, web portal, or email
features.contextAwareness: Maintains conversation flow with callback query handling
features.urgentPriority: Keywords like 'recruiter' or 'urgent' trigger immediate Slack alerts

environmentVariables.GOOGLE_SHEET_ID: Google Sheets ID for message logging
environmentVariables.DOCUMENT_UPLOAD_URL: Web portal URL for document uploads

setup.step2: Copy bot token and add to n8n credentials (Telegram API)
setup.step3: Create 'Telegram_Messages' sheet in Google Sheets with 5 columns
setup.step4: Set up Slack webhook/app for team notifications
setup.step6: Activate workflow and send /start to bot to test

useCases: Instant shift alerts for gig workers (no app download required)
Quick application submission for CNAs/LPNs on mobile
Real-time document upload reminders with Telegram photos
24/7 candidate support without live staffing costs
Interview scheduling with calendar link integration
Urgent recruiter connections with priority Slack alerts

advantages.accessibility: Telegram is free, works globally, no app store needed
advantages.richMedia: Supports photos, videos, documents, voice messages
advantages.cost: Free Telegram API, no per-message charges (vs. SMS)
advantages.multiDevice: Works on phone, tablet, desktop simultaneously
advantages.botEcosystem: Can integrate with other Telegram bots (payment, scheduling)

businessImpact.shiftFillRate: 25% increase due to instant shift alerts
businessImpact.documentComplianceTime: 3 days faster with Telegram photo uploads

pricing.n8nWorkflow: $0 (self-hosted) or included in n8n Cloud plan

alternatives.vsWhatsApp: Telegram is bot-friendly (WhatsApp requires Business API ~$0.005-0.09/msg)
alternatives.vsSMS: Free vs. $0.0075/SMS, rich media support, interactive keyboards
alternatives.vsEmail: Real-time vs. hours delay, push notifications, read receipts
alternatives.vsLiveChat: 24/7 automation vs. $50-200/month per agent, instant scale

limitations.telegramAdoption: Requires candidates to have/download Telegram (high in Europe/Asia, lower in US)
limitations.botComplexity: Complex conversations may need AI integration (GPT-4)
limitations.noVoiceCalls: Text/voice messages only, no live phone calls
limitations.spam: Public bots can receive spam (mitigated with user ID verification)

advancedFeatures.aiIntegration: Add OpenAI node for natural language understanding
advancedFeatures.voiceMessages: Accept voice messages and transcribe with Whisper API
advancedFeatures.groupBroadcasts: Send shift alerts to candidate groups
advancedFeatures.paymentProcessing: Telegram Payments API for application fees
advancedFeatures.locationSharing: Candidates can share live location for shift matching
advancedFeatures.multiLingual: Detect language and respond in user's language

complianceNotes.hipaa: Telegram Secret Chats are end-to-end encrypted (HIPAA-compliant for PHI)
complianceNotes.dataRetention: All messages logged to Google Sheets for audit trail
complianceNotes.userConsent: Welcome message includes data usage disclosure
complianceNotes.optOut: Users can /stop or block bot at any time

metrics.messagesPerDay: Average 50-200 messages/day for small staffing agency
metrics.conversionRate: 15-20% of Telegram inquiries convert to applications
metrics.userSatisfaction: 4.8/5 due to instant responses and convenience
